abstract: Unilever is hoping to get some college students dirty as part of its marketing campaign for Axe Shower Gel.
snippet: Unilever is hoping to get some college students dirty as part of its marketing campaign for Axe Shower Gel.
lead_paragraph: NEXT month some college students will face a choice: should they jump into a mound of mashed potatoes and honey, or into a giant ice cream sundae with chocolate sauce and whipped cream?

headline.main: The Campaign Is Clean, the Stunts Fairly Dirty
headline.print_headline: The Campaign Is Clean, The Stunts, Fairly Dirty
